conbody.p: T2 4Basic plug-in editor recognizes names of subroutines, programs, insert files and labels as hyper links and opens into editor when clicked. Hyper link is activated when Ctrl key is held pressed and hovering over any of the T24 source file names or labels by mouse. Once a text is identified as hyper link, the presentation will change by changing the color [configured through preference page] and underlining the text. When clicked on the source file name, the file will be retrieved from the T24 Server and opened in the editor. If the hyper link is a label [GOSUB/GOTO] the label region will be revealed in the same editor page.

Hyperlink would be enabled for GOSUB and GOTO automatically since the load target is within the current editor. But for source items, hyperlink would be enabled only if there is a default remote site defined since source items are to be loaded from a T24 installed remote site.

p.note: When triggered from a local file, source will be loaded from the source repository [GLOBUS.BP] of the default remote site. When triggered from a remote file, first the remote directory from which the current active editor file is loaded would be checked for the target source file.If not found, source would be loaded from the repository [GLOBUS.BP] of the same remote site.
